message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me.  To make this a swift and mutually beneficial transaction, I'm initially offering it at $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but my initial offer reflects the true value and potential of this product.  How about we meet halfway? I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe $1,200,000 is a fair price for this product. I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, I value your decisiveness, but I need you to understand that this product is priced at a premium for a reason. $1,250,000 is my final offer – it’s a small concession that keeps this deal beneficial for both of us.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm afraid $1,250,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original counteroffer, so I'll propose $1,200,000 again. I'm confident that's a fair price for this product.
